title: Meta-owned Instagram down for thousands of users in India: report
description: Data from the outage detection platform shows that 64% of users have reported problems logging into their Instagram accounts, while 25% are facing server connection issues and 12% are experiencing application errors.
content: Instagram, the popular social media platform owned by Meta, has experienced an outage affecting thousands of users across India, according to data from outage detection service Downdetector.Data from the outage detection platform shows that 64% of users have reported problems logging into their Instagram accounts, while 25% are facing server connection issues and 12% are experiencing application errors.Downdetector tracks outages by collating status reports from several sources, including user-submitted errors on its platform.Users reactNetizens took to social media platform X to share their concerns and frustration. One user wrote, “#instagram is down for thousands of users in India, leaving many without their daily scroll fix. Here's hoping the outage is fixed before we all remember what the real world looks like.”
